abstractContent.text: We present a demonstration of an annotation tool designed to annotate texts into a semantic network formalism called Multi-Net.
The tool is based on a Java Swing GUI and allows the annotators to edit

introductionContent.text: Cedit is apart of a project to create a rich resource of manually annotated semantic structures as anew layer of the Prague Dependency Treebank ().
The new layer is based on the MultiNet paradigm described in).
